description.p: Get the difference in days between two datetime values.

prototypes.prototype: DaysBetweenDateTimes as N (DateTime1 as T, DateTime2 as T)

description.p: Returns the difference in days between two datetime values.

discussion.p: The DaysBetweenDateTimes function computes the difference in days between two datetime values.

example.caption: DaysBetweenDateTimes() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 OrderDate, ShippedDate, DaysBetweenDateTimes(OrderDate, ShippedDate) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =08/04/1994 12:00:00 00 am|08/16/1994 12:00:00 00 am|12
